Review: The Hotel was very good. eventhough it was old but facilities were new. the room was big. I was surprised they put 2 extra beds aside from 2 double beds. the best part was the buffet breakfast which u dont get from other hotels. there was also a swimming pool where my daughter loves to swim. the downside is that there are lesser shops outside, like cafes or convenience stores where u can run some errands.
Good location, friendly personnel, swimming pool

The hotel is centrally located in the city area. There are convenience store, markets, church near it. You can easily get a cab or a jeepney upon stepping out from the hotel. The service is great with friendly hotel staffs.

The hotel is located right in the heart of the city or downtown area. It is even a few blocks away from the market where you can buy cheaper fruits that Davao is well known for (pomelo, durian & marang). It is accessible to all public transportation. The rooms are big & well maintained.

Convenient location downtown, large rooms, a nice large pool, very helpful and courteous staff. The breakfast buffet had a nice variety each day. And 2 restaurants, one was indoors, the other is out by the pool.
